item.title: Hacking Letterpress
item.description: You can also find this post on my consultancy’s blog here Letterpress is an iOS game that came out a few weeks ago and immediately became popular enough to take down Apple’s GameCenter. It’s a cross between Scrabble and Go. The game is played on a board made out of 25 letters and players take turns building words in order to capture the letters they use. I was hopelessly addicted to Letterpress until I figured out how to win consistently.
